title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 158.2 - Placement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 158.2 - Placement

State Regulations

The cover, tarpaulin or other device, when in use, shall be
securely fastened as necessary to preclude any loss of the substance being
transported from around the edges of the cover, tarpaulin or device because of
wind or the motion of the vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
158.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
